unittitle_ssm: Rev. William Ten Eyck Adams lantern slide collection on the Battle of Long Island
abstract_ssm: The collection contains hand-colored slides with both photographs and illustrations. Images include battle scene illustrations; the shore of Bath Beach and Fort Hamilton; street scenes from Bay Ridge through the Prospect Park area to the Fulton Ferry landing; maps of Brooklyn showing skirmish lines and the movement of troops; and portraits of prominent British and American generals.
subject_ssm: Street photography -- New York (State) -- Kings County
Long Island, Battle of, New York, N.Y., 1776
collection_ssm: Rev. William Ten Eyck Adams lantern slide collection on the Battle of Long Island
